jobs.name: Metacognition: Pattern Analysis
jobs.description: Analyze memory/self-review.md for recurring MISS/HIT patterns and suggest rules for IDENTITY.md

payload.message: Run `python scripts/metacognition.py analyze` and report any new patterns found. If no patterns detected, respond with HEARTBEAT_OK.

jobs.name: Metacognition: Identity Refresh
jobs.description: Inject current perceptions and curiosities into IDENTITY.md

payload.message: Run `python scripts/metacognition.py inject` to refresh the metacognitive lens in IDENTITY.md. Report only if errors occur, otherwise respond with HEARTBEAT_OK.

jobs.name: healthcheck:security-audit
jobs.description: Daily security audit of OpenClaw configuration and host posture

payload.message: Run `openclaw security audit --deep`. If any issues are found, summarize them. If clean, respond with HEARTBEAT_OK. Note: call `healthcheck` skill if remediation is needed.
Run `openclaw update status` and report if an update is available. If already up to date, respond with HEARTBEAT_OK.
